description:
Template to provide (at runtime) basic information about a flight plan that an operator and/or UAS can be expected to provide in most flight planning scenarios.

monitoring.monitorlib.clients.flight_planning.flight_info_template.BasicFlightPlanInformationTemplate, as defined in monitoring/monitorlib/clients/flight_planning/flight_info_template.py

$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

uas_state.description: State of the user's UAS associated with this flight plan.

usage_state.description: User's current usage of the airspace specified in the flight plan.
